column1: 1.  The Petitioner, Mr. Gamlath Bandara Rathnasiri (hereinafter referred to as “the Petitioner”),
alleges  a  violation  of  his  fundamental  rights  guaranteed  under  the  Constitution  of  Sri
Lanka  by  one  or  more  of  the  Respondents.  By  a  petition  dated  28th  March  2016,  the
Petitioner invoked the jurisdiction of this Court, alleging breaches of Articles 12(1), 13(1),
and 13(2) of the Constitution. On 26th October 2010, this Court granted leave to proceed
against the 1st to 4th and 6th Respondents for the purported violations of the Petitioner’s
